modShortDescription: Eric Beaudoin's friend Grand Spartan is crazy, he wants us to play a game where no firearm or explosive are allowed with the exception of the Blunderboss.
modDescription:
Eric Beaudoinâ€™s friend Grand Spartan is crazy, he wants us to play a game where no firearm or explosive are allowed with the exception of the [Blunderboss](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/). Sounds like fun.

This 7 Days to Die mod removes firearms and explosives from the game.

* **1.2:** Remove explosive arrows and bolts
* **1.1:** Improve the number of feathers found in loot
* **1.0:** Remove all firearms and explosives from the game with the exception of the Blunderbuss

**[Download](https://github.com/Laotseu/7dtdMods/releases/download/NoMoreGuns_v1.2/NoMoreGuns_v1.2.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19462-motorcyclealterations-v10-alpha-18/).

**Credits:** [Eric Beaudoin](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/eric-beaudoin/)
